title: Shared Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/4/20
itunes:title: Shared Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/4/20
description:
George Noory and psychic Mark Anthony explore the phenomenon of shared death experiences, where witnesses around a person who is dying see light or the soul leaving the body, and how the brain recovers moments before death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A psychic explains how a body's life energy leaves after death.
